additional_buffs.description: Spirit awakening max increases by 5 per Senior Wyvern Rider. (However, this value cannot exceed 25.)
additional_buffs.name: Spirit Awakening Limit Break

buffs.description: Maximum level-up increases by 10 for all units. ( [Spirit Awakening] is cumulative, but the maximum level-up for units cannot increase more than +100. Can also be activated in the Time Shop. )
buffs.name: Spirit Awakening
